lyrics:
26 contributorscount on you lyricsverse 1 jordin
now im about to give you my heart
but remember this one thing
ive never been in love before
so you gotta go easy on me

verse 2 kendall
i heard love is dangerous
once you fall you never get enough
but the thought of you leaving
aint so easy for me

prechorus jordin james logan
dont hurt me eh
desert me hmm
dont give up on me
what would i wanna do that for
dont use me
take advantage of me
make me sorry i ever counted on you

chorus btr  jordin
1 2 3 4 to the 5 baby im counting on you
1 2 3 4 to the 5 baby im counting on you
1 2 3 4 to the 5 baby im counting on you
1 2 3 4 to the 5 baby im counting on you
see big time rush liveget tickets as low as 50you might also likeverse 3 kendall carlos jordin  carlos and jordin  james
understand ive been here before
thought i found someone i finally could adore
but you failed my test
got to know her better
saw i wasnt the only one
but im willing to put my trust in you
baby you can put your trust in me

verse 4 carlos  jordin logan jordan jordin  james
just like you count to 3
you can count on me
and youre never gonna see
no numbers in my pocket no
anything im doing girl
ill drop it for you
cause youre the one im giving my heart to but i gotta be the only one

prechorus jordin  logan
dont hurt me
desert me
dont give up on me
what would i wanna do that for
dont use me
take advantage of me
make me sorry i ever counted on you
chorus btr and jordin
1 2 3 4 to the 5 baby im counting on you
1 2 3 4 to the 5 baby im counting on you
1 2 3 4 to the 5 baby im counting on you
1 2 3 4 to the 5 baby im counting on you

bridge jordin james jordin  james and btr
i really hope you understand
that if you wanna take my hand
you should put yours over my heart
i promise to be careful from the start
im trusting you with loving me
very very carefully
never been so vulnerable
baby ill make you comfortable

chorus btr kendall jordin logan
1 2 3 4 to the 5 yeah baby im counting on you ohh
1 2 3 4 to the 5 why would i want to do that hey yeah
1 2 3 4 to the 5 oh whoa baby im counting on you
1 2 3 4 to the 5

outro jordin  all
now im about to give you my heart
so remember this one thing
ive never been in love before
yeah you gotta go easy on me4embed
